thread.title: Oddsmaker lists 49ers chances with Alshon Jeffery, Kirk Cousins
thread.title_full: Oddsmaker lists 49ers chances with Alshon Jeffery, Kirk Cousins

author: Kirk Larrabee
title: Oddsmaker lists 49ers chances with Alshon Jeffery, Kirk Cousins
text:
Oddsmaker lists 49ers chances with Alshon Jeffery, Kirk Cousins See the odds one site has of Kirk Cousins and Alshon Jeffery ending up as 49ers. Slot to San Francisco 49ers Newsletter Newsletter 
How do oddsmakers feel about the San Francisco 49ers' chances of landing a big offseason target in Kirk Cousins or Alshon Jeffery? 
Bookmaker.eu has odds for where both impending free agents will be playing in Week 1 of the 2017 season, with the 49ers getting better odds at landing Cousins than Jeffery. The 49ers as of Tuesday stood at +700 with Cousins, the third-highest odds. The odds were lower for Jeffery at +1400. 
Here's a look at the site's odds for each player: 
Kirk Cousins
